201.comments: For BA students in year 4 only. Students wishing to take MATH 444 should register in the wait list for this course. Students will be screened for eligibility and proximity to graduation. Students are advised that this class has a strict cap of 15 students and so they will want to have an alternate plan for meeting the BA research requirement. MATH 441 is one such option, but there are also non-MATH options. NO STUDENTS WILL BE FORCED INTO THIS CLASS OVER THE CAP.

202.comments: Students wishing to register in MATH 444 should register on the wait list. Students will be screened and moved into this class from that wait list. Note that this course has a strict cap of 15 students, no exceptions. Students should have an alternate plan if they are not placed in this course. There are alternate courses so the last course rule does not apply to MATH 444.

description: Current research topics in pure and applied mathematics are explored at the undergraduate level.  Technical communication and research skills are developed.
